plot: Zimbo Films first production follows a young actress as she grapples with the part of Peter Pan she plays on stage, as well as with the death of her abusive father.
title: The Little White Bird
plot_es: Zimbo Films first production follows a young actress as she grapples with the part of Peter Pan she plays on stage, as well as with the death of her abusive father.
plot_en: Zimbo Films first production follows a young actress as she grapples with the part of Peter Pan she plays on stage, as well as with the death of her abusive father.
